author: cityMONK
title: Proud Son of India, goes with boots on, Dr. Kalam RIP.
text: India Mike » India Travel » India Travel Basics » India Travel News and Commentary » Proud Son of India, goes with boots on, Dr. Kalam RIP. Proud Son of India, goes with boots on, Dr. Kalam RIP. # 1 WENT WITH BOOTS ON. Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam passes away.He collapsed while giving a lecture in IIT Shillong and was rushed to hospital. India loses, a gem, a missile man and a proud son . Rest in Peace. His last image as received on apps. Papaya is a Vegetable and Tomato is a Fruit
